title.en: Merched y Wawr Clydach Branch t the start of the 2016 - 2017 Term
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Clydach ar ddechrau tymor 2016 – 2017

description.en:
Merched y Wawr Clydach ar ddechrau tymor 2016 – 2017 – blwyddyn dathlu hanner can mlynedd mudiad Merched y Wawr.
Brenda Evans, Ann Williams, Gill Jones, Doreen Hopkins, Einir Watts Rees, Nesta Hopkinson, Rhiannydd Williams, Viv John, Heather, Fenal Roberts, Heulwen Morgan, Hilary Thomas, Irene, Mair Evans, Iris Williams, Mary Davies, Elaine Waghorn, June Griffiths, Mair Williams, Margaret Cairns, Barbara Pritchard, Jean Walker, Ann Jones, Pauline Harris
